poemsDataJson.list_full: 月(つき)みれば 千々(ちぢ)にものこそ 悲(かな)しけれ わが身(み)ひとつの 秋(あき)にはあらねど
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: As I view the moon,//Many things come into my mind,//And my thoughts are sad;//Yet it's not for me alone,//That the autumn time has come.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Tsuki mireba|Chiji ni mono koso|Kanashi kere|Waga mi hitotsu no|Aki ni wa aranedo
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: わかみひとつの あきにはあらねと
poemsDataJson.author: 大江千里(おおえのちさと)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 秋の夜の月をながめて、物思いにふける孤独の悲哀
